blogPost.title: A new wave of activism is spreading in Uganda, rippling through WhatsApp groups and Twitter hashtags, as young women push back against harassment and unequal treatment #IWD2021 https://t.co/i6AqWk6WSt
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 一股新的行动主义浪潮正在乌干达蔓延，波及WhatsApp群组和Twitter标签，年轻妇女正在反击骚扰和不平等待遇#IWD2021 https://t.co/i6AqWk6WSt。
一股新的行動主義浪潮正在烏干達蔓延，波及WhatsApp羣組和Twitter標籤，年輕婦女正在反擊騷擾和不平等待遇#IWD2021 https://t.co/i6AqWk6WSt。

previous.title: People can fall in love with artificial intelligence. But can AI fall in love with humans in return? Nobel laureate Sir Kazuo Ishiguro talks to Anne McElvoy about his new novel #KlaraandtheSun on “The Economist Asks” https://t.co/cFKINwCALn

localize.full_text: 人们可以爱上人工智能。但人工智能能反过来爱上人类吗？诺贝尔文学奖得主石黑一雄爵士在 "经济学家问 "https://t.co/cFKINwCALn，与安妮-麦克尔沃伊谈论了他的新作《#KlaraandtheSun》。
人們可以愛上人工智能。但人工智能能反過來愛上人類嗎？諾貝爾文學獎得主石黑一雄爵士在 "經濟學家問 "https://t.co/cFKINwCALn，與安妮-麥克爾沃伊談論了他的新作《#KlaraandtheSun》。

next.title: Hawa Abdi guided the growth of her village from a one-room rural maternity clinic, into a 400-bed hospital with three operating theatres, a school for 850 children and seven feeding centres. Our obituary from last year #IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN

localize.full_text: Hawa Abdi指导她的村庄从一个只有一间房的农村妇产科诊所发展成为拥有400张床位、3个手术室、850名儿童的学校和7个供餐中心的医院。我们去年的讣告#IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN
Hawa Abdi指導她的村莊從一個只有一間房的農村婦產科診所發展成爲擁有400張牀位、3個手術室、850名兒童的學校和7個供餐中心的醫院。我們去年的訃告#IWD2021 https://t.co/qdD2EcIzFN
